description: Strategic guidelines for 5v5 arena combat in Wrath of the Lich King

mechanics.chaos_factor: High. CC is less effective due to instant dispels. Burst is king.

Standard_Play.plan: Pick the squishiest target (usually Shaman/Mage). count down 3-2-1. EVERYONE BURSTS.
Standard_Play.switch: If target uses immunity (Ice Block/Bubble), HARD SWITCH to nearest target instantly.

Euro_Comp.tactics: Control 3 people. Kill 1. Massive CC chains (Fear/Poly/Clone) covering the map.

Drain_Comp.tactics: Mana burn EVERYONE. Viper Sting EVERYONE. OOM the healers in 30 seconds.
